MAN.TITLE: findobj
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: find an object with specified property

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: prop : string character Name of the property to test.
value : string character specify the value the tested propoerty should be equal to. o h : handle of the found object.

DESCRIPTION.P: This routine is currentlyt used to find objects knowing their 'tag' property. It returns handle of the first found object which property 'prop' is equal to 'value'. If such an object does not exist, the function returns a void matrix.

MAN.AUTHOR: Bertrand Guiheneuf
